website_summaries.verdict: This model is simple but effective, and provides excellent breathing exercise for a low price.
pros: Three-chamber design is easy to use, and can improve lung capacity with regular use
Some users say it's pleasant to use
Price falls on the lower end of the scale
cons: Doesn't measure inhalation rate higher than 1,200 PSI

customer_reviews.title: This works and is fun too
customer_reviews.text: Air quality during the many fires here nearly put me in the hospital. As a former smoker, i had a hard time walking and breathing. I decided to try this Breath exerciser to expand my lungs. I was shocked to find how bad my lung power was. i had a hard time getting one ball up. But after using this twice a day for a few weeks, has really changed my lung power. I still can't get all three balls up, but i am doing great. And it is fun! I can just sit in my easy chair and play with this and improve my lung volume. Soon, i am gonna get the third ball up. Maybe i'll go dancing!
customer_reviews.author: Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! When I opened the package and tried to connect the breathing tube to unit it didn’t have very secure connection. Would like to return it but this seller does not accept returns! The product I received is not made well! And it was twice the cost of most spirometers I foolishly thought it would be exceptional. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: blaire

customer_reviews.title: Defective product & not elegible for returns.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed: Just received my product today and it comes with a crack (check image) it’s pretty messed up since this product works by putting air pressure (any leak can make it totally useless) & it’s not elegible for returns.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela M.

customer_reviews.title: Got ripped off!
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a very puny contraption that is a waste of money. Threw it out since it's not returnable. Sorry I got sucked in.
customer_reviews.author: Rose E. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: helpes me keep my lungs in condition so that I can walk when weather permits.
customer_reviews.text: I have COPD and am off oxygen right now. But because of the pollution and winds I can not venture outside much. This has helped me keep my lungs in condition so that I can walk when weather permits.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Brandstoettner

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but doesn't measure breath strength up to normal healthy adult level
customer_reviews.text: This works fine for what it is, but with one big problem I only learned after purchase -- it only measures up to 1200 PSI, while the average healthy adult male is supposed to be able to breathe at 1500 PSI or above. Given that there are other products that go up that high that cost just the same amount here, I recommend getting those instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Pettus

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I'd do just that! Used it twice and the balls don't raise anymore. Tubing seems cheaply made. Not sure if that's the issue. Bad thing is I purchased 3 for myself, Hubby and Mom. So I have two that are unopened. Item cannot be returned. #disappointedcustomer #lessonlearned
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: MANUFACTURER DOES NOT ACCEPT RETURNS. I RECEIVED A DEFECTIVE UNIT AND CANNOT RETURN IT FOR A REFUND. DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS MANUFACTURER.
customer_reviews.author: mexrph

customer_reviews.title: HEALTHY LUNGS
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on my sister's recommendation - she's a nurse - it's perfect! Inexpensive and works great .. exactly as described. It was delivered quickly and the directions for use are simple & easy to follow. No assembly or setup. Great for exercising lungs and increasing capacity .. never more important than during a COVID pandemic. Thank you for the prefect product to help with lung health. Namaste!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Wright

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for children
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old son who was born with a complex congenital heart defect HLHS. I bought to help him with lung compacity and he really loves trying to get all the balls up in the air. He thinks he is playing a game and I am getting the needed therapy I need out of him.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya E Lang

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Well packaged. Easy to use. I start off each day using this for several minutes. I do not have any sort of breathing problems, I use this to exercise my lungs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works very nicely
customer_reviews.text: Since the coronavirus started, I am using this product every day, twice a day. It keeps my lungs strong. I have a history of bronchitis whenever I catch a cold, so especially in these days, I always want to keep my body and my lungs strong and I’m susceptible to anything that might weaken them. This product helps a lot and I’m glad I got it
customer_reviews.author: Sara Weston

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product looks used and worn. The mouth piece looks chewed up and the product was dirty. I am very disappointed because the quality seems cheap and I can’t return it?! I purchased it for my grandma to help her breathe better however I recommend other spirometers ...
customer_reviews.author: Green girl

customer_reviews.title: Most Helpful
customer_reviews.text: The breathing tool was recommended by my doctor when I was on the verge of catching pneumonia. It was hard the first couple of days. But the more I was able to blow the more I knew my lungs were clearing up. I totally recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Emjay

customer_reviews.title: I purchased 2 of these for my husband and my ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these for my husband and my father. As a RN, I know the true value of breathing exercises and agree with the other reviewer that everyone should have one of these and practice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Failure
customer_reviews.text: Assembly required and no where does it show that. The snorkel end and the device end are the same size and it was impossible to get together w/o tearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Not use..like a toy
customer_reviews.text: My husbands respiratory therapist recommended getting one of these. This is a piece of junk..no effort at all the get the balls to raise. Get a better one this is like a child’s toy.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi h

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing I can even run
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this breathing exerciser a few days and boy do I have some work to do. I still play doubles tennis, but I notice my past damaged 'smoking lungs' when I have to run. I'm hoping to improve them. I've only been able to hold the first red ball up for 4 seconds. Hopefully that will continue to increase. It's amazing I can even run. I love your breathing results can be measured!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Defective and too expensive to ship back to India for return
customer_reviews.text: Defective. No connection between chamber you breathe into and chambers with balls. Vendor is in India and you have to pay shipping to return which from my U.S. location was as much as the product price so it ended up as plastic garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: like a toy!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I like about this devise. It is tiny and hard to blow in. I used two in hospital, nothing like this. It is like a child's toy.
customer_reviews.author: Gerla

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected....like a Toy
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked to see how tiny it is when I took it out of the box. Looks like a toy....
customer_reviews.author: AmyCha

customer_reviews.title: Exercise for your lungs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 92 year old mother after having two cases of pneumonia and thought it wouldn't hurt her to exercise her lungs to help clear them. At first she wasn't able to get the first ball up 1/2 a ball length. After a week she was actually able to get all three balls to the top. I highly recommend this product for anyone who wants to expand their lungs whether you have good lungs or not. Excercise is good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia G

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before buying a very expensive breath strengthener and I found that this works perfectly fine and was 1/3 of the price. Item came well packaged and fit the budget and does what it is supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Ifyoulikepinacoladas

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for lung rehab
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Family member with asthma and pneumonia needed to get lungs expanded. This is lightweight, portable and fun to use. The balls make for a game when using the product and the object is always achieved by getting the lungs back in order.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely one

customer_reviews.title: Without the mouth piece being able to connect u can’t use it.
customer_reviews.text: The mouth piece doesn’t fit, too small to connect the part together. How r u suppose to use it🤔 One star because there’s no other option for no star😟
customer_reviews.author: BUllitt514

customer_reviews.title: Screw job, this is the size of a toy. don't get suckered in. It is not returnable,
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting for this. I had one like it in the hospital. When it arrived, it was about 4 inches. I needed this and got ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: HollyBelle

customer_reviews.title: Life saving for us
customer_reviews.text: This breathing exercise really helps my 93 year old dad. He has congestive heart failure and using this several times a day has really helped clear his lungs.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Shoup

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but quite helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been struggling with bronchitis for over a month now and was looking for something that would help expand my lung capacity and show me how I was progressing, as well as potentially help prevent pneumonia from settling in. After just a few days of use, I believe it’s really helped quite a bit. Arrived quicker than expected and the instructions were easy to follow. I love that it is made to be easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I think this was put together wrong. I had to turn the machine upside down to even get the balls to move. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: A Great Little Lung Exercise Unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a breathing exercise machine and should not be confused with more general lung capacity units. I used it after surgery as one part of recovering my lung capacity.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN OCONNOR

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER I USED IT ONCE
customer_reviews.text: Low quality. It stopped working after I used it once.
customer_reviews.author: FarleyFarley

customer_reviews.title: Strengthen your lungs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my nephew, he's asthmatic, to strengthen his lung capacity. His Specialist believe the exercise can help him. The product is as described and appears well made. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C Mihm

customer_reviews.title: Exercise your lungs.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to keep your lungs clear and active. This requires a person to inhale to raise the balls sequentially. (more dificult than you might think.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for some
customer_reviews.text: This device is too hard to use for those with weak respiration which is was bought to help with.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Swood

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my breathing
customer_reviews.text: I have breathing problems and this thing seems to help straighten out my condition. The only thing I don't like is the smell that comes with the product. Other than that, it is a solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa Zhukova

customer_reviews.title: Great Product To Use!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It worked very well formy husbands lungs. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Weber

customer_reviews.title: SCAM, WORTHLESS, TOY
customer_reviews.text: Hi I am Dr P, I am a physician. This product is worthless, It is a toy, very very small. DO NOT BUY. You cannot return the item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly
customer_reviews.text: Needed this after my elderly mother fell and wasn’t walking around as well as she was prior. This kept her lungs healthy and was helpful in preventing pneumonia.
customer_reviews.author: J Clark

customer_reviews.title: Certainly helps, great product
customer_reviews.text: This breathing exerciser really does help, would recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line, IT DOESN’T WORK! If you used an air compressor, unless you hold the device upside down, the balls don’t move. Unfortunately I tried this a week past the eligible return date. Now I’m stuck with this useless piece of plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breath Exercise Measurement System
customer_reviews.text: was just what I was looking for and works well
customer_reviews.author: S. Goodrum

customer_reviews.title: Good habit to get into to keep lungs functioning
customer_reviews.text: Product works fine bought for my dad who has congestive heart failure it keeps his lungs healthy
customer_reviews.author: Erin go braugh

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Just had lung surgery on my left lung after complications from Pneumonia. This Spirometer has been very effective at increasing the lung capacity to 60%...hoping to get the lung up to 75%. The infection was so bad that I'll never get full use back but 75% would be great as that the right one is at 100%. I would give this spirometer a 10 out of 10 for effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: Ribbed off! Not returnable!
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived defective and smelling very bad (like diarrhea) no way I’d put this near my mouth. Since it is non returnable I feel ribbed off. Do not purchase this inferior item it is a smelly piece of junk. I requested a refund, but had no response at all!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mutters

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: As like some of the reviews i too cannot return mine as it does not work. The only thing i can think of is the tube is not sealing and i will never buy something again that i cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen lewis

customer_reviews.title: This is an Inhale training device
customer_reviews.text: (NOT FOR BAND USE) This is a really great product if you’re wanting to work on your breathing skills by practicing a LONG sustained inhale. Unfortunately that’s not what I was wanting in a breathing trainer, but it is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk!
customer_reviews.text: The item arrive smelling like diarrhea, no way I’d put this near my mouth. The item is a miniature version of any unit I have seen. Since it is non returnable I feel robbed. Do not purchase this inferior item it is a smelly piece of junk.m
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions to assemble but it doesn't work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jobeth

customer_reviews.title: The box and wrapping It smelled like throw up so I didn’t even want to use
customer_reviews.text: The box and wrapping It smelled like throw up so I didn’t even want to use
customer_reviews.author: Alkiah Waller

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact product I received. The breathing device is small and portable. Due to germs and frequent cases of pneumonia, I chose this one that can come completely apart in order for cleaning. I can see this being a real help in gaining lung strength.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: That this item can not be returned
customer_reviews.text: This item is good the only thing that I disliked about it is it can not be returned mine came in . The only thing is the mouth piece was broke . And for the size of it it’s a little pricey I would not buy this again
customer_reviews.author: pearl courtemanche

customer_reviews.title: Great lung exercises
customer_reviews.text: Like it for breathing exercises for husband with copd to strengthen his lungs
customer_reviews.author: Joe Reed

customer_reviews.title: No tube with the device
customer_reviews.text: No tube arrived with the item, it’s a paperweight for me
customer_reviews.author: J. Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: It's small
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. I expected it to be a larger size though.
customer_reviews.author: Sultana

customer_reviews.title: Item is Missing Pieces-UNUSABLE
customer_reviews.text: The item is missing the hose to breathe into. Therefore, it is unable to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Israel

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I went to a medical supply store and was told I'd never find an Incentive Spirometer. Not only did I find it on Amazon but I found the perfect one for me! I am very pleased with my purchase and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: One of the balls would not work and you had to turn it upside down to use. I would not recommend this company as they don’t check the accuracy of their products. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Does not work - do not buy. And has a no return policy. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: jayN

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: item looks like a child toy I want to return what do you intend to do about this . again nothing in you sale add that states no return.
customer_reviews.author: dominick dellegrazie

customer_reviews.title: Good for nothing
customer_reviews.text: This does not help to expand lungs- 1200 cc - this is a joke. I would not recommend. It needs to be 5000 cc to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: D Zarella

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: You need to inhale to make the green ball hit the top of the tube - this takes practice but good lung exercise
customer_reviews.author: maryleevance

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the most part
customer_reviews.text: The product is compact and easy to use. My only complaint is that the mouth piece was dirty when the product arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Avemaria Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my breathing I like this machine very much it helps me to open up my airways which I have COPD Great lung exerciser at your own speed.Thank you and BLESS you..
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Not eligible for returns?!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived today, but is defective...and - evidently - not eligible for returns. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Never to buy from this company again
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Works only when held upside down, one ball can Never be raised!! Not just by me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: like a toy! not like medical grade. small small small
customer_reviews.text: like a toy! not like medical grade. small small small. junk waited too long to return it I guess says can't return???? It wants me to rate it but No stars would be the best or a negative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps breathing easier, opens lungs.
customer_reviews.text: To help my lungs. I can tell a difference in my breathing, it helps opening my lungs.
customer_reviews.author: nina giles

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Did not like unable to return overpriced do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Nita betts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with quality of deep breather. It is just what I wanted. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not true to words not the size I was looking for instead a doll size

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work. I've had devices like this in the past, and this one is poorly made and defective. Vendor does not accept returns.
customer_reviews.author: JYC

customer_reviews.title: Item was as described
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described and was helpful to my husband who just had open heart surgery and the hospital sent him home without one. :(

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I could not use it. not worth what I payed for it
customer_reviews.author: Carina’s

customer_reviews.title: Breathing Machine
customer_reviews.text: My mom needed this product to exercise her lungs following a cold to ward off pneumonia. It's been working good so far!

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: This item does not work!! I am unable to return due to company policy. I will never shop here again.

customer_reviews.title: and it's fun to use
customer_reviews.text: It has improved my breathing, and it's fun to use.

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: The machine is small and serves the purpose. Really easy to clean and use..
customer_reviews.author: vinis walker

customer_reviews.title: The size.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike is to small same a my hand size , I was thinking is the big size.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: this item arrived broken and since unreturnable I have no recourse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this item was as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My husband has an illness and this is helping to regain some of his strength of his breathing
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: There is a hole in the hose, it does not work
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: I have asthma and it is tougher than it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: I have asthma and it is tougher than it looks to make the balls stay up. They say work on making the Red ball stay up for eight seconds and then move onto the green ball keep them both up for eight seconds, and then move on to the Blue ball. I can't even get the red to stay up for more than two seconds. I think this is made in India. I don't know how accurate this is as a medical tool. But it should give you some exercise for your lungs.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good lung exercise. The plastic rubbing should be a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT GET RIPPED OFF! Zero stars no returns
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as advertised. Do not buy at all costs. 20 rip off!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Weaver

customer_reviews.title: A totally bogus product
customer_reviews.text: The unit is totally bogus. The chamber that one blows into is dead-ended - it does not flow air to the chambers with the balls in it. The chamber is totally solid so air does not go through at all. It looks cute but that is all. Comes directly from India with no packing slip.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Speer

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't even get the first ball up...
customer_reviews.text: My lung function is severely reduced so I hoped this would help be improve it. I have a similar but different design with just one ball given by the hospital and that works enough I can use it. On this device I can't even reliably get the first ball to rise, let alone the others. Maybe my lung function (40%) is already too little to use this, or maybe it just doesn't work very well, either way, it wasn't a great purchase for me. It's also much smaller than I imagined it would be, almost pocket sized.
customer_reviews.author: BirdOPrey5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: makes you work hard but can see an improvment worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Crook

customer_reviews.title: I can operate other spirometers more easily. Maybe this one will do me more good ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel it is not well sealed, and thereis an air leak. I can operate other spirometers more easily. Maybe this one will do me more good since it is more difficult to use
customer_reviews.author: queencaren

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my patients with occupational lung disease ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my patients with occupational lung disease .....the holes at the bottom are to big to assist them in lung exercises..... I bought one with all blue balls also and my patients can use this to strengthen their lungs. I am an RN.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Builds lung strength, may not help all asthma types.
customer_reviews.text: As a severe asthmatic I can definitely say consistent exercise with this has helped build lung strength. Wether my asthma has improved is debatable... But I believe it's worth the effort. Easy to put together. Put the mouthpiece in your mouth and breathe in and each ball will lift up. Keep them up as long as you can. Over time you will be able to do this longer and longer.
customer_reviews.author: RayChu

customer_reviews.title: Got this product and using for three weeks and could ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this product and using for three weeks and could only get the first ball up at first. Now can get up two balls and hold them there for 7 seconds or more. I will keep using to improve my breathing. Less short up breath now.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Heath and Yorga ( Deep Breathing Exercise
customer_reviews.text: this is a great item to use to strenghted your lungs, I have asthma and boy has it helped me to get better,, I use it 1 x daily,, and at first I could only move the red ball 1/2 way up now I have both the red and the yellow balls up, with no trouble as all you need to do is suck in the air on a inhale breath,,, I am very please and its a smaller item to use than the larger ones I see on ebay.. thanks to the seller A++++++ in my book
customer_reviews.author: Joann Lavis

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad. He has already made an improvement on his lung capacity. Severe COPD. It definitely is helping. The nurses from home healthcare recommended me getting one, I'm very glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: SHOP 907

customer_reviews.title: SoulGenie HealthAndYoga(TM) Deep Breathing Exerciser
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that is easy to assemble. I found this product very easy to use. As an "older person" I use this product for greater lung expansion because while not ill, I don't want to have to wait until I need it. Would certainly purchase another for someone else if needed.
customer_reviews.author: GGoldwire/Phila

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth it, I saw improvement in 3 days; now after 3 weeks I can hold the green ball for almost 60 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Horrinle Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This item came and was packaged correctly, but did had a hole in the tube and did not work. There is no refund policy on this item. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Gaspari

customer_reviews.title: Does not work !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Receive product today and it does not work!!! How can Amazon allow someone to sell a defective product and not allow refunds???? This is absolutely ridiculous. Spent almost $20 for nothing. Really needed to have a device like this. I would give 0 stars but it doesn’t allow!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Pneumonia Exercise
customer_reviews.text: We bought this at the urging of a nurse who said it would benefit my husband after being in the hospital for 66 days with pneumonia. He is using it regularly to keep his lungs open and functioning well.
customer_reviews.author: Stella1

customer_reviews.title: Used for someone with Covid
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter to use, who is recovering from Covid-19.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Does this work....YES
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help my deep breathing with COPD. First few days only one ball moved....next week I could move the second ball a little...have me encouragement to getting better...now I am at full force and working on a longer time keeping all the balls in the air..next investment I have made since I was diagnosed with COPD
customer_reviews.author: B.McC

product_meta.title: HealthAndYoga(TM) Deep Breathing Exerciser - Breath Exercise Measurement System
feature_bullets: Compact, high quality break-resistant plastic, 3-ball inhaling breath measurement system
Solid, non-shaky Construction; Removal bottom for thorough cleaning and hygiene maintenance
Deep Breathing Exerciser for comprehensive respiratory fitness - 3 chambers for differing inhalation rates from 600cc/sec to 1200 cc/ sec
Helps achieve optimum lung capacity and restoring disrupted breathing patterns
Complete Instructions Provided; See video in images alongside; Ball Colors may vary
